title: Outstanding Engineering Scholarship
description: For students with an average above 90 and low financial background.
extendedDescription: The 'Outstanding Engineering Scholarship' is intended to encourage students in the field of engineering studying at the Technion. The scholarship provides significant financial assistance, along with personal mentoring, participation in professional workshops, and inspirational lectures. Recipients are required to maintain academic excellence and be involved in community or social activities throughout the year.
